includedAssets.title: A Scandal In Belgravia
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep1 - A Scandal In Belgravia
includedAssets.synopsis: A case of blackmail threatens to topple the monarchy itself, but soon Sherlock and John discover there is more to it than meets the eye. They find themselves battling international terrorism, rogue CIA agents, and a secret conspiracy involving the British government. Has Sherlock finally met his match in the form of the cold, calculating and seductively brilliant Irene Adler?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sherlock and John find themselves at the heart of an international conspiracy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A case of blackmail threatens to topple the monarchy itself, but soon Sherlock and John discover there is more to it than meets the eye. They find themselves battling international terrorism, rogue CIA agents, and a secret conspiracy involving the British government. Has Sherlock finally met his match in the form of the cold, calculating and seductively brilliant Irene Adler?

includedAssets.title: The Hound Of Baskerville
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep2 - The Hound Of Baskerville
includedAssets.synopsis: Something terrible has happened to Henry Knight; Sherlock and John investigate the truth about the monstrous creature which apparently killed their client's father. A hound from hell? What seems like fantasy in Baker Street is a very different prospect in the ultra-secret army base that looms over Dartmoor.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sherlock and John investigate a monstrous creature which apparently killed their client's father. Could it really be A hound from hell?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Something terrible has happened to Henry Knight; Sherlock and John investigate the truth about the monstrous creature which apparently killed their client's father. A hound from hell? What seems like fantasy in Baker Street is a very different prospect in the ultra-secret army base that looms over Dartmoor.

includedAssets.title: The Reichenbach Fall
includedAssets.synopsis: The Tower of London, Pentonville Prison, the Bank of England. All broken into on the same day. Only James Moriarty could do it. But why didn't he steal anything? Soon a darker purpose unfolds. The final battle between the masterminds. And neither can hope to walk away from it.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Moriarty returns for the crime of the century. Can Sherlock survive the battle of the masterminds?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Tower of London, Pentonville Prison, the Bank of England. All broken into on the same day. Only James Moriarty could do it. But why didn't he steal anything? Soon a darker purpose unfolds. The final battle between the masterminds. And neither can hope to walk away from it.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Sherlock Holmes and Dr John Watson take on three of the super-intelligent sleuth's most famous cases in this second season of Mark Gatiss and Steven Moffat's universally acclaimed adaptation. Benedict Cumberbatch and Martin Freeman star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sherlock (Benedict Cumberbatch) and John (Martin Freeman) take on three of the super-sleuth's most famous cases. Series two of the acclaimed drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sherlock Holmes and Dr John Watson take on three of the super-intelligent sleuth's most famous cases in this second season of Mark Gatiss and Steven Moffat's universally acclaimed adaptation. Benedict Cumberbatch and Martin Freeman star.

includedIn.title: Sherlock
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A chance encounter brings Afghanistan veteran John Watson into the unique world of genius sleuth Sherlock Holmes.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: A chance encounter brings Afghanistan veteran John Watson into the unique world of genius sleuth Sherlock Holmes.
